snippet.title: Claire de Lune - Character Spotlight: Arturo
snippet.description:
Meet Arturo, John's quick-witted AI companion! 
In Claire de Lune, John and Arturo must find unique means of traversing the treacherous planet surface and navigating through the mysterious research facility found there.

Claire de Lune, our story-driven puzzle adventure game is now available to wishlist on Steam and Epic Games Store!

Claire de Lune 
http://www.clairegame.com 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/717110/Claire_de_Lune/
Epic Games Store: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/claire-de-lune/home

Tactic Studios 
Creators of fine video games.
https://tacticstudios.com/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/TacticStudiosGames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TacticStudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tacticstudios/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TacticStudios/
